column4: right. I need to ask something. How the heck do I connect from one machine to another machine using X forwarding? (i.e. XDMCP)
Because as of Karmic, I can't connect to my X server from any other machines in the network.
I can't even connect to my OWN X server using the network address.
Try nxclient/server from nomachine.com. It's x forwarding without the hassle, and it tunnels over ssh.
